document_data.title: It Came from the Sky
document_data.mainbody:
'''''It Came from the Sky''''' is an adventure module set in ''Malatra – Living Jungle'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 3{{rd}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Living Jungle]]'' series of adventures published for the RPGA Network.

{{Quote|''A weapon has been uncovered that can be used to aid in the war against Tiger. Heroes are asked to go and find it. A Living jungle adventure for all levels.''}}
document_data.Summary: The adventure takes place after the events of ''[[The Sickness]]'', in the Year of Despair ([[1375 DR]]), Malatran calendar. The spirits guided the heroes of the [[Ling Jungle]] toward the [[saurial]] village of [[Lilac (village)|Lilac]], where [[Starr]] the [[Shaman]] and [[Trueblood]] the [[Witch-Doctor]] shared a vision with them of a ball of fire plummeting from the skies. The [[meteor]]ite fell onto the [[Malatran Plateau]], leaving fiery death and destruction within its crater. The jungle spirits contained the destruction and extinguished the fires. When they saw a local tree transformed through the meteor's magic into [[Spirit Tree]], they communed with laterals, prophesizing the tree to be used in the looming battle with the [[Tamara (Malatra)|Tamara]]. The adventurers were tasked with digging the tree out and transporting it to Lilac. Subsequently, the Spirit Tree was delivered to the saurial witch doctor, and the group only needed to decide what kind of weapon they would craft using the wondrous tree.
